title: My first create champ Zero Tester
body:
I set a pictures to look like this or something like this maybe.
This is her Abilities hope you like it.
Name: Zero Tester ( or you can think about new)
Story: She is a alien form another dimension. She found our planet with her tehnology just to see how we are stronge and to make new friends. Her bacis attack deal damage with her plasma pistol. (but she can be some space girl or somthing like that P.S. maybe for the first time black girl :D) (P.P.S. i am not racist)
Abilities:

Passive: Her passive is stacks, when she hit target 8 time with Q she gain special abiliti on Q that she can trow 8 time projectil dealling 50% less damage and more damage (+ 40% of Attack Damage) but she can't move. Missile is trowing when summoner click in just 1 place all 8 missile go there. Also she can stack W, E, R, and when she get 4 W and 5 E and 3 R she can use them again and dealling 30% more damage on enemy.

Q-Double hit Cooldown
7/6/5/5/4
Her Q is working she trow 1 mini missile, ih missile hit target she gain 1 more missile to shot 1 missile deal 40/60/75/90/110 damage (+ 30% of ability power) and 2 misile deal 60/70/80/90/100 damage (+ 35% of Abilit power). After 8 stack gain next missle powerfull to hit 30% more damage (+15% of her ability power)

W-Spear shot Cooldown 
22/20/18/16.5/14.5
Her W is working she trowh space spear dealing 30/40/50/60/70 (+ 30% of ability power)  that when she hit target with sprea they are little in slow and after 4 second deal 35/45/55/65/80 damage (+ 25% of ability power) and target is stun for 2 secunde. If she hit comrade she give little movement speed to her for 3 sekcunde and after 3 second she grab comrade to her. After 4 stack she can use again spear and dealing 25% more damage (+ 15% of Ability power).

E-Are you afraid of me Cooldown 14/13/12/11/9
Her E is dimension travel to any object but it's work only if you use to someone or something Spear shot. After teleporting to enemy she make fear on them 1 secund and make them bleed for 5 secunde. bleed 4, 4, 4, 4, 5. After 5 stack she can agian use teleport and fear them for 1.5 secunde and beed them for 4 secunde. 5, 5, 5, 6.

R-Hide and Seek Cooldown
90/80/70
Her ulty is make a 2 points on that distance but not too long distance and then portal is apair befor she get in portal she blast plasma shot and 1 sekunde while she apair in seconde mark palce of portal she deal 400/500/600 (+ 60% of ability power), (Her portal is visible for 3 secunde then disappear) . After go trought portal she became invisible for 5 seconde and gain little movement speed. After 3 stack she can use again portal is gona be visible for 5 secunde and she can throw her speels Q,W then go in there and get more movement speed and invisibility for 7 secunde.

replies.body: Diz is the germany forum please go to the england forum

> [{quoted}](name=Hamrio,realm=EUW,application-id=L7E6lhzo,discussion-id=Pw7TBKBV,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-07-15T10:38:50.547+0000)
>
> Diz is the germany forum please go to the england forum

XD

Wohl wahr, aber so wirklich Englisch ist das jetzt ehrlich gesagt auch nicht...ob die im englischen Forum also mehr damit anfangen können, weiß ich nicht ;)

@Zer0Tiper
Es ist immer schön, wenn jemand Championkonzepte entwickelt, aber verfasse dein Konzept doch zum einfacheren Verständnis lieber in deiner eigenen Muttersprache (ich schätze mal Deutsch, da du es ins deutsche Forum geschrieben hast). 
Wenn du es unbedingt auch auf Englisch verbreiten möchtest, damit es mehr Leute erreicht, lass dir einfach von jemandem helfen, der sich mit der Sprache nicht ganz so schwer tut und dir hilft dein Konzept zu übersetzen.
Naja ich erkenne wenigstens noch was er schreiben wollte...
